name: Narrow Cravat
description: Folding technique to create a narrow cravat bandage from triangular cloth
warning: Used for various bandaging applications. Ensure cloth is clean before use.
emergency_notes: Narrow cravat can be used for head injuries, limb bandaging, and securing splints
Always check that folds are even and tight

steps.title: Preparing the Triangular Bandage
steps.description: You'll need a triangular bandage. If unavailable, use a clean piece of cloth, clothing, or a large handkerchief. Cut or fold it into a triangle shape.
steps.voice_prompt: Prepare a triangular bandage or a clean cloth folded into a triangle.

steps.title: Hold the Bandage
steps.description: Hold the apex (tip) in one hand and an edge in the other.
steps.voice_prompt: Hold the apex, or tip, in one hand and one edge in the other.

steps.title: First Fold
steps.description: Fold the apex in half with the apex on one of your hands
steps.voice_prompt: FFold the apex in half with the apex on one of your hands

steps.title: Second Fold
steps.description: Fold it in half again to make it narrower.
steps.voice_prompt: Fold it in half again to make it narrower.

steps.title: Tuck and Pull
steps.description: Insert your hand inside the fold, grab the corner, and pull it out to neaten the shape.
steps.voice_prompt: Insert your hand inside, grab the corner, and pull it out to neaten the fold.

steps.title: Fold Once More
steps.description: Fold the bandage in half again to make it even narrower.
steps.voice_prompt: Fold the bandage in half once more to make it even narrower.

steps.title: Tuck and Pull
steps.description: Insert your hand inside the fold, grab the corner, and pull it out to neaten the shape.
steps.voice_prompt: Insert your hand inside, grab the corner, and pull it out to neaten the fold.

steps.title: Final Fold
steps.description: Make one last fold in half to complete the narrow cravat.
steps.voice_prompt: Make one final fold in half to complete the narrow cravat.

steps.title: Final Tuck
steps.description: For the last time, insert your hand inside the fold, grab the corner, and pull it out to neaten the shape.
steps.voice_prompt: Insert your hand inside, grab the corner, and pull it out to neaten the fold.
steps.critical_warning: Tip: The narrow cravat should be tight and even for effective use in bandaging
